title: Rare 80s EPs Vol. 1 - Half Church - Turmoil EP [1981]
description:
I have a number of great 80s EPs that users request from me from time to time. I had never posted them before as you are aware an extended play (EP) is a vinyl record or CD which contains more music than a single, but is too short to qualify as an LP. Usually, an EP has around 10ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“28 minutes of music, for this reason they never made it to 4 rare 80s albums series. The first post is requested by Jeremiah and I hope he does not miss this!

Half Church - In Turmoil 
Label: WiN Records (2)  
Catalog#: WiN 3137  
Format: Vinyl, 12"
 
Country: US 
Released: 1981 
Genre: Rock  
Style: New Wave  
Credits: Engineer - Kif Kif*

Notes: Recorded at Street Level, London, March 1981.
